HackerTyper.title: Online Hacker Simulator - Prank Your Friends | Free Hacker Typer
HackerTyper.description: This interactive online hacker app will let you simulate that you're hacking a computer or a digital network. Adjust the screen in the Start menu, open and minimize the windows and play with them
HackerTyper.keywords: hacker simulator, hacker typer, fake hacker, prank hacker, online hacker, geek typer

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about the hacker simulator

0.question: Is this a real hacking tool?
0.answer: No, this is a simulator for educational and entertainment purposes only. It displays realistic-looking hacker code but does not perform any actual hacking activities.

1.question: How do I make the code appear?
1.answer: Simply click on the Terminal window to activate it, then start typing any keys on your keyboard. The simulator will automatically display realistic hacking commands and code.

2.question: Can I change the appearance?
2.answer: Yes! Click the Start button in the bottom left corner to access settings. You can change color themes (B&W, DOS, Pascal, Green), font styles, window sizes, and text size.

3.question: What are the different windows for?
3.answer: The simulator includes multiple windows showing different aspects of hacking: Terminal for commands, Directory for file browsing, Encryptor for code compilation, Transfer for network monitoring, Scripts for process management, and more. Click on any window to view its content.

4.question: Is it safe to use?
4.answer: Yes, completely safe! This is purely a visual simulation that runs in your browser. It doesn't access your files, network, or perform any actual hacking activities.
